hanzi-su-wiki:
頼

Значения

Просить, поручать, полагаться; надежный; полагаться, надеяться

Мнемоника

Умение головы 頁 в нужный момент собрать все мысли в пучок 束 в значении «полагаться на; надеяться; поддержка, опора, помощь».

Варианты

賴, 赖
purpleculture_pinyin:
lài
Japanese variant of 賴 |赖
Японский вариант Лай | Лай
rtega_mnemonic:
賴賴RS
赖赖		頼rely, depend on, trust, accuse falsely, request
  • bundle 束 of pages 頁: one requests one when buying a machine and one relies on it's contents to operate it: 頼 → 賴
heisig_constituent: trust, bundle, Chaplin, tree, wood, mouth, head, page, one, ceiling, drop, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
koohiiStory1: When you trust in something, you've got your head 頁 all bundled 束 up (wrapped up) in it.
koohiiStory2: We found a bundle of severed heads in your room, its difficult to trust you.
kunYomi: たの.む、たの.もしい、たよ.る
jp_example_words:
頼み(たのみ): request, favor, reliance, dependence
依頼(いらい): request, commission, dispatch, dependence, trust
信頼(しんらい): reliance, trust, confidence
頼もしい(たのもしい): reliable, trustworthy, hopeful, promising
頼る(たよる): rely on, have recourse to, depend on
頼む(たのむ): to request, ask
jp_readingExamples: 頼む (たの.む), 頼もしい (たの.もしい), 頼る (たよ.る)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A bundle of geoducks is something you can always trust.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: A bundle of geoducks will never lie, never let you down, and never disappoint you. You can trust them completely.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: While you can trust a bundle of geoducks, never ever trust rye (らい) bread.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine a bundle of geoducks and a piece rye bread. Think about how you can trust the geoducks but you can't trust the rye bread.
Ru_Radicals: ｜, ハ, 口 (рот), 木 (дерево), 目 (глаз), 貝 (раковина), 頁 (страница)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the page (頁) with the bundle (束) relies on it

Main pronunciation 主要发音: lài

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning to rely upon.

English senses 英语理解: rely, depend on; accuse falsely

Usage example 用法举例: 賴皮 lài pí (shameless)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 1409

Shuowen 说文解字: 贏也從貝剌聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 賴 mutant 頼 from cowry (贝)貝 bèi and phonetic knife-slash 剌 lá and (rem- 束 shù)(rem- (负)負 fù) (rem- 頁 yè) C338 賴<頼> simp 赖. (name- rely-on-profit (赖)賴頼 lài)

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :
(- Shuowen: 剌貝) (- could be 束負) (- seal characters exist in both forms)

Simplification rule :

Simplification rule explained :

Variant rule : C338 賴<頼>

Variant rule clarification :
賴 (to rely upon) TW 頼 <to rely upon>

Applied rules : B004 贝貝

New font rule :

頼字的基本解释

頼
lài
古同“赖”。

頼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lài］
［《廣韻》落蓋切，去泰，來。］
“赖1”的繁体字。亦作“頼1”。
(1)利益；好处。
(2)得益，受益。
(3)依靠；凭借。
(4)取；获取。
(5)骗取。
(6)抵赖；不认账。
(7)诬枉；诬赖。
(8)耍赖。亦指无赖的作风和行为。
(9)责怪。
(10)留在某处不肯离开。
(11)坏；差。
(12)幸而；幸亏。
(13)通“懶”。懒惰。
(14)通“厲”。祸患，有害于。
(15)通“厲”。恶疮病。
(16)通“藾”。植物名。通称藾蒿。
(17)古国名。在今湖北省随州市。
(18)古地名。春秋齐邑。在今山东聊城西。
(19)姓。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lài］
["Guangyun" Go to Thailand, come. ]
Traditional characters of "赖1". Also known as "頼1".
(1) Benefits; benefits.
(2) Benefit, benefit.
(3) Rely on; rely on.
(4) Take; get.
(5) Fraud.
(6) Denial; denial.
(7) False; false.
(8) Shame. Also refers to the style and behavior of a rogue.
(9) Blame.
(10) Stay somewhere and refuse to leave.
(11) Bad; bad.
(12) Fortunately; Fortunately.
(13) Through "lazy". lazy.
(14) Through "Li". Disaster, harmful to.
(15) Through "Li". Malignant sores.
(16) Through "藾". Botanical name. Commonly known as Artemisia rotundifolia.
(17) Ancient country name. In today's Suizhou City, Hubei Province.
(18) Ancient place names. Spring and Autumn Qiyi. In today's west of Liaocheng, Shandong.
(19) Last name.

lài
яп. вм. 赖
Radicals: 束, 頁  (bundle, geoduck)
Meaning Mnemonic
A bundle of geoducks is something you can always trust.
A bundle of geoducks will never lie, never let you down, and never disappoint you. You can trust them completely.
Reading Mnemonic
While you can trust a bundle of geoducks, never ever trust rye (らい) bread.
Imagine a bundle of geoducks and a piece rye bread. Think about how you can trust the geoducks but you can't trust the rye bread.
